definition: disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence

sentences.english: Ishall be gone, and you may whistle for me.
sentences.chinese: 我却不在，你只有徒然地将我思念。

sentences.english: How then comfort ye me in vain, seeing in your answers there remaineth falsehood?
sentences.chinese: 你们对答的话中既都错谬，怎么徒然安慰我呢？

sentences.english: I gave your children blows to no purpose;
sentences.chinese: 我责打你们的儿女是徒然的，他们不受惩治。

sentences.english: Have ye suffered so many things in vain?
sentences.chinese: 你们受苦如此之多，都是徒然的吗。

sentences.english: There is nothing in life which harasses and annoys that may not become subservient to the highest ends.
sentences.chinese: 要记得你生活上困恼和烦扰，没有一点是徒然的。

sentences.english: If love, and so also willing, if do not love for children, autumn in vain also.
sentences.chinese: 假如爱，等上千年也心甘，若不爱，望眼将穿也徒然。

sentences.english: Then let the sad eyes of love vainly watch and weep.
sentences.chinese: 那就让爱的愁眼，徒然地因着盼望而流泪。

sentences.english: Verily I have cleansed my heart in vain, and washed my hands in innocency.
sentences.chinese: 我实在徒然洁净了我的心，徒然洗手表明无辜。

sentences.english: Verily I have cleansed my heart in vain, and washed my hands in innocency.
sentences.chinese: 我实在徒然洁净了我的心，徒然洗手表明无辜。

sentences.english: This kind of video does not have commercial value, unfruitful raise bandwidth cost.
sentences.chinese: 这类视频没有商业价值，又徒然增加带宽成本。

sentences.english: So clearly we worship idols in vain.
sentences.chinese: 很清楚我们崇拜偶象是徒然的。

sentences.english: Who renders vain their deep desire?
sentences.chinese: 是谁让他们的渴望成徒然？

sentences.english: One of the important themes in Kenkou's work Tureduregusa is the inconstancy of life.
sentences.chinese: 无常观是兼好的作品《徒然草》中的主要思想之一。

sentences.english: There is nothing in life which harasses and annoys that may not become subservient to the highest ends. They are His mountains.
sentences.chinese: 要记得你生活上困恼和烦扰，没有一点是徒然的。

sentences.english: In other words, what God says is not in vain.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，神所说的话不会是徒然的。

sentences.english: Love at a wrong time, deep-seated is also vain.
sentences.chinese: 相爱不逢时，刻骨亦徒然。

definition: in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
variant of 憑空|凭空[ping2 kong1]
